Package TetrisModel

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TetrisShapeInterface
    TetrisShapeInterface is used to implement rotate methods by different shapes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Block
    Block - definiuje pojedynczy blok, z ktorego skladaja sie wszystkie ksztalty Tetrominoes positionX wspolrzedna X positionY wspolrzedna Y textureImage kolor danego bloku oznaczony jako liczba
    LineCleaner
    class LineCleaner private int[] numberOfBlocksInTheRow - stores actual number of blocks in the row LineCleaner removes whole lines and moves down everything what is above removed line
    RandomShapeGenerator
    RandomShapeGenerator class uses java.util.Random in order to get random TetrisShape
    Score
    Score class used to count score in current Tetris game score is stored as Integer, every line that is cleaned is added to score as number of blocks in the line or in other words the width of tetris board
    Speed
    Speed class is used to count and store level, speed[] Array contains possible times with TetrisShape is moved down during Game
    TetrisModel
    TetrisModel class containing data about current tetris board, and shapes currently displayed
    TetrisShape
    abstract class, every Tetris shape in the game inherits after this class blockSet przechowuje bloki skladajace sie na aktualny ksztalt tetrominoe state tells about state of shape 0 - vertically, up 1 - horizontally, right 2 - vertically, down 3 - horizontally, left
    TetrisShape_I
    TetrisShape-I ---- - vertical I I - horizontal I I
    TetrisShape_J
    TetrisShape_J * * ** **** * **** * * ** *
    TetrisShape_L  
    TetrisShape_O
    Tetris Shape_O ** **
    TetrisShape_S  
    TetrisShape_T  
    TetrisShape_Z
